attributes.action: think again before allocating additional funding to train home grown Muslim "Imams," or make available additional equivalent funding for the training of religious leaders of all other faiths operating within the UK, as this ill-founded idea has the potential to yet further damage inter faith harmony within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
